name: Don't let light scape
description:
The objective is to keep the driver who is trying to escape inside the light. Always move your mouse, because you need to be tracking the driver.

How to play:
-  Use your mouse to follow the ball.

- Click (a lot, spam it!) to recharge the light.

Music:
